title: What should one choose between radiology or obgyn? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do yourself a favor. Get into medical school first, THEN do some clinical rotations and talk to Residents in each of those specialties. Uh-Oh! You mean you are already in medical school? Really? And you don't know to specify your level of training you're in and what country you're contemplating doing your Residency training in? Remember: with the exception of North Korea, you could be asking about these two careers anywhere in the world. Quora is an internationally-accessible website!
